title: Versioned OG/Twitter card image as static /assets file with consistent metadata URLs

requirements.summary: Add new versioned OG image as a direct static asset at frontend/public/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg.
acceptanceCriteria: A file exists at `frontend/public/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg` in the repository.
After deployment, visiting `https://www.prabhatchhirolya.com/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg` returns HTTP 200 and displays the image (not HTML).
The response includes an appropriate `Content-Type` for a JPEG image.

file_operations.description: Add the required generated Open Graph/Twitter card image (1200×630 JPEG) at `frontend/public/assets/generated/ogcard-v2.jpg.dim_1200x630.jpg` for source tracking and verification.

Add the deploy-target OG image at `frontend/public/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg` (JPEG). Source it from `frontend/public/assets/generated/ogcard-v2.jpg.dim_1200x630.jpg` to ensure correct dimensions and format, and keep it as a direct static file (no routing/JS handling).

requirements.summary: Update OG/Twitter image meta tags in frontend/index.html to the absolute versioned /assets URL.
acceptanceCriteria: No remaining OG/Twitter image meta tags reference the previous `ogcard.jpg` URL.

file_operations.description: Replace `og:image`, `og:image:secure_url`, and `twitter:image` content values to use the exact absolute URL `https://www.prabhatchhirolya.com/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg`, and remove any remaining references to `https://www.prabhatchhirolya.com/ogcard.jpg`.

requirements.summary: Ensure canonical, og:url, and twitter:url all use the exact trailing-slash URL in frontend/index.html.

file_operations.description: Ensure URL consistency by setting `<link rel="canonical">`, `og:url`, and `twitter:url` to exactly `https://www.prabhatchhirolya.com/` (including the trailing slash).

requirements.summary: Explicitly include assets/ogcard-v2.jpg in .ic-assets.json5 with correct Content-Type headers.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5` includes a rule that matches `assets/ogcard-v2.jpg` with `ignore: false`.
After deployment, `https://www.prabhatchhirolya.com/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg` is served as a static asset with the configured headers.

file_operations.description: Add an explicit asset rule for `assets/ogcard-v2.jpg` with `ignore: false` and headers including at least `Content-Type: image/jpeg` (and align cache headers with existing static image rules as appropriate).

requirements.summary: Update OG preview verification documentation to reference the new versioned OG image URL and deployed file path.
acceptanceCriteria: The documentation’s “OG card image” URL and any direct-browser test instructions reference `https://www.prabhatchhirolya.com/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg`.
The deployment checklist references `frontend/public/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg` as the required deployed file location.

file_operations.description: Update all references from `ogcard.jpg` to the new versioned asset URL `https://www.prabhatchhirolya.com/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg`, and update file-location guidance/checklists to use `frontend/public/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg` as the deployment target (and optionally reference `frontend/public/assets/generated/ogcard-v2.jpg.dim_1200x630.jpg` as the source).
